rect.style: paint-order: fill; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 2px; stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); fill: rgb(38, 38, 42);
paint-order: fill; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 2px; stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); fill: rgb(38, 38, 42);

path.style: stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(38, 38, 42); transform-box: fill-box; transform-origin: 50% 50%;

rect.style: paint-order: fill; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-width: 2px; stroke: rgb(38, 38, 42); fill: rgb(38, 38, 42);
